member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Navigation.Repositories.NavigationMenuRepository.AddChild(System.String,Penguin.Cms.Navigation.NavigationMenuItem)
member.summary: Adds a child to the parent. This exists because attempting to load and add the child can potentially Orphan navigation menu items that the user doesn't have permission to see, since they wont be a part Of the model when its passed back in

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Navigation.Repositories.NavigationMenuRepository.AddIfNew(Penguin.Cms.Navigation.NavigationMenuItem)
member.summary: Adds a new entity if none with matching URI exists, otherwise merges with the existing menu
member.param: The Navigation Menu Item to add or use as a merge source

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Navigation.Repositories.NavigationMenuRepository.GetByHref(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a navigation menu item with a matching href
member.returns: A matching navigation menu item or null

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Navigation.Repositories.NavigationMenuRepository.GetByName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a navigation menu item by name
member.param: The name of the navigation menu item to get
member.returns: A navigation menu item with a matching name, or null

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Navigation.Repositories.NavigationMenuRepository.GetByParentId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the child list of navigation menu items for the parent with the given Id
member.param: The Id of the navigation menu item to get the children of
member.returns: The child list of navigation menu items for the parent with the given Id

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Navigation.Repositories.NavigationMenuRepository.GetByUri(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a navigation menu item by URI
member.returns: A navigation menu item with matching URI, or null

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Navigation.Repositories.NavigationMenuRepository.GetRootByName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a root navigation menu item with a matching name, or null
member.param: The name of the navigation menu item to get
member.returns: A root navigation menu item with a matching name, or null

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Navigation.Repositories.NavigationMenuRepository.GetRootMenus
member.returns: A recursive list of root menus
